verbs.description: He [V: will] replace Tom Bossert , who resigned in April at the request of Trump 's national security adviser , John Bolton .
[ARG2: He] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: replace] [ARG1: Tom Bossert , who resigned in April at the request of Trump 's national security adviser , John Bolton] .
He will replace [ARG0: Tom Bossert] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: resigned] [ARGM-TMP: in April] [ARGM-CAU: at the request of Trump 's national security adviser , John Bolton] .
